main event: Two bright, white objects were spotted maneuvering erratically at high speed and an altitude of about 3000 feet over Fairborn, Ohio on July 7, 1953.
interesting points: The objects were observed for about 15 minutes and described as being brightly illuminated and maneuvering erratically at high speed.
The objects were concluded to be unidentified flying objects (UFOs).
The witness was driving south on U.S. Route 35 between Fairborn and Xenia, Ohio when they spotted the objects.
The witness reported the speed, altitude, and observed phenomena confirmed the objects were not conventional aircraft.
The report includes hand-drawn sketches of the objects and their flight paths.
